ygData.subject: Re: Chivtrons' base
ygData.msgSnippet: The Recons burst into immediate laughing at burning hammer s futile attempts. You don t get it do you burning hammer? You can t kill us we re all holograms.

Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base

From: "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@...>

The Recons burst into immediate laughing at burning hammer's futile 
attempts. "You don't get it do you burning hammer? You can't kill us we're 
all holograms. The real Recon isn't even here right now, all together we 
formed a very firm hologram, now with us seperated from each other we can't 
be hurt. But the crucifixes can still hurt you," teh holograms said and held 
out the crucifixes.


>From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base
>Date: Fri, 9 Mar 2001 22:41:09 -0500
>
>Burning Hammer laughs. He switches his gun to rapid mode, whee he can fire
>up to 25 shots without moding! So he fires at each one of them once!...
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@...>
>To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
>Sent: Friday, March 09, 2001 10:32 PM
>Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base
>
>
> > "You are the devil himself an I will destroy you. The reason the energon
>is
> > not affecting me is because I'm not really a transformer, you couldn't
>even
> > tell that I am not real, HA! Where's the all mighty seeing power of 
>yours
> > now devil," "Recon" asked. Suddenly dozens of Recons appear and form a
> > circle around Burning Hammer. "Which of us is the real Recon and which 
>of
>us
> > is a hologram," they all asked at once. (The rules said no drones or
>humans,
> > they never said anything about holograms.)
> >
> >
> > >From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

> > >Burning Hammer walks towards Recon, smiling.
> > >
> > >Burning hammer: I relish energon. My body holds a high concentration of
>it,
> > >in fact. How is it that you are holding it if all transformers are weak
>to
> > >it, hmm? You speak like you are god. I am god!...
> > >
> > >----- Original Message -----
> > >From: "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@...>
> > >To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
> > >Sent: Friday, March 09, 2001 9:57 PM

> > >
> > >
> > > > "The minions of the devil are only as strong as their master is. And
>one
> > > > thing that the devil is weak against is this," Recon told him and
>pulled
> > >out
> > > > a sterling silver crucifix and showed it to burning hammer, "even 
>the
> > >devil
> > > > himself fears the power of Christ burning hammer. He has no power
> > >against
> > > > the mighty power of God," Recon tells hims, sounding like a preacher
>and
> > > > walks toward sky hammer while holding the crucifix in front of him.
> > > >
> > > >
